snippet: The generals, including the son of a former high-ranking leader, were the latest to fall under President Xi Jinping’s sweeping anticorruption campaign.
abstract: China releases names of 14 generals who are being investigated or have been convicted under Pres Xi Jinping’s sweeping anticorruption campaign, which has to date focused on former senior members of Central Military Commission rather than those appointed by Xi.
lead_paragraph: The generals, including the son of a former high-ranking leader, were the latest to fall under President Xi Jinping’s sweeping anticorruption campaign.

headline.main: China Names 14 Generals Suspected of Corruption
headline.print_headline: China Names 14 Generals Suspected of Corruption
